phrases: It's important to be confident in your abilities, but also humble enough to keep learning and growing.
She approached the job interview with confidence, knowing she had prepared well.
I feel much more confident after practicing my speech a few times.
His impressive abilities in coding helped him land the job at the software company.
As a coach, it's important to focus on developing your athletes' abilities and pushing them to their full potential.
She was surprised by her own abilities in public speaking after taking a course and practicing regularly.
